glsa.title: T1Lib: : Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in T1Lib, the worst of which could lead to remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: T1Lib is a library for rasterizing bitmaps from Adobe Type 1 fonts.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in T1Lib. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Remote attackers, by coercing users to process specially crafted AFM font or PDF file, could cause a Denial of Service condition or execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All T1Lib users should upgrade to the latest version:
